doc.title: Andai ia tahu
doc.plot: Rio Danisworo is a rigid "all about business" young professional. He led a bleak life, stuck in a boring routine created by his ambition to become a successful producer in one Jakarta's leading TV Station. Until one day, Renata Adhiswara came into his world. As a young writer, her fun loving, witty and kind personality represent everything that Rio is not. Both got stuck in a broken elevator, 17 level above ground. In those short time, Rio learn about the things he missed all this time. After the short encounter, they separated and go their on ways. But the memories of their time together lingers inside their hearts. Can those memories be strong enough to make them find their own ways, back in each others arms again?
